channel.title: Safe zones?
channel.description: i currently found a new location for my shops, thanks jc!, and idk how to make it a safe zone! wut do i do? :D

item.title: Safe zones?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Lol, you’re in luck. I used that area for my FunPk area.

Put this under the last set of coordinates.

|| (absX >= 2575 && absX <= 2600 && absY >= 3900 && absY <= 3925)

Read full topic

item.title: Safe zones?
item.dc:creator: @XXwolfXX XXwolfXX
item.description:
@XXwolfXX wrote:

yeah i know but there can be a bunch are the coordinate suppose to be specific?

Read full topic

My coordinates in safezone are 2581 3919, 2592 3919, 2591 3907, 2578 3906… idk did it make sense?[/quote]

To add your own safezone just do this:

  public boolean nonWild() {
        if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431)

The coordinates you gave me are not right, you only need a total of 4 coordinates.

item.title: Safe zones?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:

item.title: Safe zones?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

XXwolfXX:

Yeah i know i am there it gives me a bunch of coordinates for Wilderness places… how do i make coords 2589 3912 safe zone!?

You need the Southwest X and Y coordinates of your safe zone and the Northeast X and Y coordinates of your safe zone.

A safe zone is essentially a big box.

Read full topic

item.title: Safe zones?
item.dc:creator: @XXwolfXX XXwolfXX

item.title: Safe zones?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

public boolean nonWild() {
if(absX >= SW XCOORD && absX <= NE XCOORD && absY >= SW YCOORD && absY <= NE YCOORD) {
return true;
}
return false;
}

Read full topic
